verse.name: c1
verse.lines: But God hath promised strength for the day, newline Rest for the labor, light for the way, newline Grace for the trials, help from above, newline Unfailing sympathy, undying love.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: God hath not promised skies always blue, newline Flower strewn pathways all our lives through. newline God hath not promised sun without rain, newline Joy without sorrow, peace without pain.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: God hath not promised we shall not know newline Toil and temptation, trouble and woe. newline He hath not told us we shall not bear newline Many a burden many a care.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: God hath not promised smooth roads and wide, newline Swift, easy, travel needing no guide, newline Never a mountain, rocky and steep, newline Never a river, turbid and deep.
